long_description: Smooth and ready for training, the Salomon Trail shorts for men keep you comfortably gliding along miles of your favorite running trail. Lightweight fabric and liner shorts wick moisture and dry quickly. UPF rating of 50+ protects pasty winter thighs from too much sun exposure. Adjustable drawstring keeps the Trail shorts in place as you bound across the trail; single zipped pocket stores extras. Shorts feature reflective Salomon logos on front and back for visibility in low light. Close-to-skin fit.
